languages.text: "Полагаю, что любая ваша служанка скажет что угодно, лишь бы задобрить человека с лицом Вольного Торговца. Ее показания не имеют веса в данном деле".
"Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, что любая ваша служанка скажет что угодно, лишь бы задобрить человека с лицом Вольного Торговца. Ее показания не имеют веса в данном деле".

traits.locale_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."
"Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."
"Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."
"Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."
"Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

languages.text: "Jeder Eurer Diener würde sagen, was nötig ist, um die Gunst der Person zu erlangen, die das Gesicht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} trägt. Ihre Aussage hat in diesem Prozess kein Gewicht."
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Eurer Diener würde sagen, was nötig ist, um die Gunst der Person zu erlangen, die das Gesicht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} trägt. Ihre Aussage hat in diesem Prozess kein Gewicht."

languages.text: « N'importe lequel de vos serviteurs dirait ce qu'il faut pour s'attirer les bonnes grâces de {mf|celui|celle} qui porte le visage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Son témoignage n'a donc aucune valeur dans cette affaire. »
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: « N'importe lequel de vos serviteurs dirait ce qu'il faut pour s'attirer les bonnes grâces de {mf|celui|celle} qui porte le visage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Son témoignage n'a donc aucune valeur dans cette affaire. »

languages.text: “无论是谁，只要是顶着行商浪人这张脸，{mf|他|她}的仆人为了讨得欢心，肯定只会说该说的话。她的证词在本案中毫无分量。”
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: “无论是谁，只要是顶着行商浪人这张脸，{mf|他|她}的仆人为了讨得欢心，肯定只会说该说的话。她的证词在本案中毫无分量。”

languages.text: «Cualquier sirviente suyo diría lo que fuera necesario para ganar el favor de la persona que porta el rostro de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su testimonio carece de valor en este caso».
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier sirviente suyo diría lo que fuera necesario para ganar el favor de la persona que porta el rostro de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su testimonio carece de valor en este caso».

languages.text: 「あなたに仕える者であれば誰であれ、ローグトレーダーの顔をした者に取り入るために、必要なことは何でも言うでしょう。彼女の証言はこの件において何の重みも持ちません」
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに仕える者であれば誰であれ、ローグトレーダーの顔をした者に取り入るために、必要なことは何でも言うでしょう。彼女の証言はこの件において何の重みも持ちません」

languages.text: "Sana tabi olanlar, Hür Tacir kılığında gezen birine yaranmak için ne gerekiyorsa onu söyleyecektir. Onun şahitliği bu davada geçersizdir."
languages.original_text: "Any servant of yours would say whatever necessary to curry favour with the person wearing the Rogue Trader's face. Her testimony holds no weight in this case."

traits.locale_text: "Sana tabi olanlar, Hür Tacir kılığında gezen birine yaranmak için ne gerekiyorsa onu söyleyecektir. Onun şahitliği bu davada geçersizdir."
